item.title: 西安电子科技大学的专利数量超过哈佛大学和麻省理工学院，推动了中国人工智能的蓬勃发展
item.description:
数十年来，清华大学一直在培养中国顶尖的理工科学生。现在，它站在了人工智能革命的最前沿。【原文：

Tsinghua University has educated the country’s top science and engineering students for decades. Now, it’s at the forefront of the AI revolution.

】

item.title: Genmab 完成 4 月以来最大一笔杠杆融资并购交易
item.description: Genmab A/S 完成了美国杠杆融资市场自 4 月份以来最大的一笔收购融资，通过垃圾债券和杠杆贷款融资 45 亿美元。【原文：Genmab A/S completed the US leveraged finance market’s largest acquisition funding since April, raising $4.5 billion through junk bonds and a leveraged loan.】

item.title: 中国加强动物实验，帮助赢得生物技术竞赛
item.description:
在今天的《亚洲大观察》播客中，我们将关注中国为开发新药而在大型动物身上进行的尖端实验。【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast we look at cutting-edge experiments on large animals in China in a bid to develop new drugs.

】

item.title: 巴里克调整领导层和运营部门，力图扭转颓势
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份内部备忘录，巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. is overhauling its regional operating model in a shakeup that includes a raft of management changes in a bid to improve performance, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 交易员对冲美联储减息 即使减息几率减小
item.description: 投资者正在对美联储下月降低借贷成本进行套期保值，即使再次降息的几率已经降到了抛硬币的程度。【原文：Investors are hedging against the Federal Reserve lowering borrowing costs next month even as the odds of another interest-rate cut have come down to a coin flip.】

item.title: 9 月份外国持有的美国国债接近历史最高水平
item.description: 美国国债的海外持有量在 8 月份创下历史新高后，9 月份有所回落，其中英国削减了其库存，而日本则继续增加其投资组合。【原文：Overseas holdings of US Treasuries retreated somewhat in September after notching a fresh record high in August, with the UK paring back its stockpile and Japan continuing to add to its portfolio.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒 "独熊 "称机械制造商并非人工智能宠儿
item.description: 卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.卡特彼勒公司主要靠销售黄色推土机等设备赚钱，这些设备使卡特彼勒公司成为美国工业的中坚力量。【原文：Caterpillar Inc. was always an unlikely winner in the artificial intelligence craze. It makes the bulk of its money selling the equipment like yellow earth movers that has made it a stalwart of American industry.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将主要利率下调至 8%，未来将进一步放宽政策
item.description: 乌拉圭延长了宽松周期，将基准利率下调四分之一个百分点至 8%，并表示愿意进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：Uruguay extended its easing cycle by lowering the benchmark interest rate a quarter point to 8% and signaled its willingness to further lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 今天的互联网为何如此脆弱
item.description: 对于世界上大部分地区来说，已经不存在离线这一说法。互联网支撑着全球金融和消费生态系统，使即时通信和交易成为可能。虽然该系统与人类的许多活动密不可分，但它也很脆弱，一旦部分系统停止工作，就会造成数十亿美元的损失和巨大的不便。【原文：For much of the world, there is no longer any such thing as being offline. The internet underpins the global financial and consumer ecosystem, enabling instant communication and transactions. While the system is integral to so much human activity, it’s also fragile, costing billions of dollars and creating huge inconvenience when part of it stops working.】

item.title: 美国计划批准向沙特人工智能企业 Humain 出售芯片
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，在沙特王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤之际，美国计划为向沙特阿拉伯人工智能公司 Humain 首次销售先进人工智能芯片开绿灯，这标志着这家国家支持的企业取得了胜利。【原文：The US plans to greenlight the first sales of advanced artificial intelligence chips to the Saudi Arabian AI firm Humain, people familiar with the matter said, marking a win for the state-backed venture as Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman meets with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 新加密货币押注下挫，散户交易员掌握市场时机
item.description: 华尔街急于在加密货币热潮中套现，推出了各式各样的交易所交易基金，这看起来是一个尴尬的时机：自比特币 10 月份达到顶峰以来，其市值已经缩水了约 6000 亿美元。【原文：Wall Street’s rush to cash in on the crypto boom by launching exchange-traded funds of all stripes is looking like a case of awkward timing: All 11 ETFs mostly tied to smaller cryptocurrencies that debuted recently are in the red, caught in a broader selloff that’s wiped roughly $600 billion from Bitcoin’s market value since its October peak.】

item.title: 金融股发出警告，可能跌破支撑位
item.description: 银行股和金融股即将跌穿关键支撑位，向股市其他板块发出警告信号。【原文：Bank and financial stocks are on the cusp of crashing through key support levels, sending a warning sign to the rest of the stock market.】

item.title: 对人工智能泡沫和增长的担忧正悄然渗入美国信贷市场
item.description: 席卷全球金融市场的萎靡不振正在悄悄蔓延到信贷市场。【原文：The malaise sweeping financial markets globally is creeping into credit markets.】

item.title: 法国法院驳回对雀巢公司 Perrier 水的投诉
item.description: 法国一家民事法庭驳回了针对雀巢公司（Nestlé SA）的一项法律申诉，该申诉可能会威胁到其价值数十亿美元的标志性品牌 Perrier 水的未来。【原文：A French civil court rejected a legal complaint against Nestlé SA that could have threatened the future of its iconic, billion-dollar Perrier water brand.】

item.title: 康涅狄格州为州养老金存入 15 亿美元：财务主管
item.description: 康涅狄格州财长埃里克-拉塞尔（Erick Russell）周二表示，康涅狄格州向资金不足的州雇员和教师养老金转移了约 15 亿美元的超额预算储备金，使过去六年中这些基金的额外存款超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Connecticut transferred about $1.5 billion in excess budget reserves to its underfunded state employees’ and teachers’ pensions, bringing extra deposits in the funds to more than $10 billion over the last six years, state Treasurer Erick Russell said Tuesday.】

item.title: 如果特朗普下令关门，SAP将维持微软欧盟云的运行
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府制裁海牙一家国际法庭之后，即使外国政府试图切断SAP SE对微软公司云服务的访问，SAP SE也将保持对微软云服务的访问。【原文：SAP SE will maintain access to Microsoft Corp.’s cloud services even if a foreign government attempts to cut it off, after Donald Trump’s administration sanctioned an international court in the Hague.】

item.title: Meta 在美国联邦贸易委员会关于 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 交易的反垄断审判中获胜
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二赢得了一项关键诉讼，联邦法官裁定该公司收购照片分享应用 Instagram 和信息服务 WhatsApp 不违反美国反垄断法。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. won a key lawsuit Tuesday after a federal judge ruled that the company’s acquisitions of the photo-sharing app Instagram and messaging service WhatsApp don’t violate US antitrust law.】

item.title: 卡尔希首席执行官称，预测市场将在数年内与股票市场并驾齐驱
item.description: Kalshi Inc. 首席执行官塔里克-曼苏尔（Tarek Mansour）表示，预测市场的发展速度远远超过了之前的预期，在短短几年内就能与证券交易所相媲美。首席执行官塔里克-曼苏尔（Tarek Mansour）表示。【原文：Prediction markets are growing far faster than previously expected and will rival stock exchanges in just a few years, according to Kalshi Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tarek Mansour.】

item.title: 欧盟主席里贝拉权衡谷歌在广告技术调查中的 "严肃 "提议
item.description: 欧盟竞争事务主管特雷莎-里贝拉（Teresa Ribera）表示，监管机构正在审查谷歌提出的 "严肃 "提议，以纠正与其广告技术业务有关的涉嫌违反反垄断法的行为。【原文：Teresa Ribera, the European Union’s competition chief, said regulators are examining a “serious” offer from Google to fix alleged antitrust violations linked to its ad tech business that sparked a fine of nearly €3 billion ($3.5 billion).】

item.title: 卢克石油求购者名单扩大至埃克森、雪佛龙和阿布扎比
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）、雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）、阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp., Chevron Corp., Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. as well as US private equity giant Carlyle Group are among companies interested in Lukoil PJSC’s international assets, a sale hastened by US sanctions due to kick in next month.】

item.title: 美国声称成功通过制裁打压俄罗斯油价
item.description: 美国财政部在一份不寻常的声明中声称，该部门最近为削弱俄罗斯对乌克兰战争的筹资能力所做的努力取得了成功，展示了针对石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）的措施所产生的市场影响。【原文：The US Treasury claimed success in the department’s latest efforts to undermine Russia’s funding capacity for its war against Ukraine, in an unusual statement showcasing the market impact of measures against oil giants Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC.】

item.title: 马克龙称德国和法国寻求推迟高风险人工智能规则的出台
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙表示，德国和法国希望将欧盟人工智能法案中监管高风险人工智能系统的条款推迟一年。【原文：Germany and France want to delay by a year provisions of the European Union’s AI Act that would regulate high-risk artificial intelligence systems, according to French President Emmanuel Macron.】

item.title: 2025 年比特币大崩盘使其落后于债券、黄金和其他货币
item.description: 这种曾被寄予 "登月 "厚望的资产正奋力追赶国债。比特币已从2025年的峰值下跌了近30%，落后于从科技股到国债的所有产品。【原文：The asset once expected to “go to the moon” is struggling to keep pace with Treasuries. Bitcoin has fallen nearly 30% from its 2025 peak, lagging behind everything from tech stocks to T-bills.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月会议的不确定因素
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Meta 首席营收官在广泛的领导层调整中离职
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.首席营收官约翰-黑格曼（John Hegeman）将离开这家社交网络领导者，这是这家公司在实施耗资巨大的人工智能战略的压力下进行的数次领导层变动之一。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Revenue Officer John Hegeman is leaving the social networking leader, one of several leadership changes at a company under pressure to deliver on a costly AI strategy.】

item.title: 南非顶级银行家看好利好消息狂潮
item.description: 在一连串利好消息的刺激下，南非的顶级银行家们对国家的经济前景表现出了几十年来最乐观的态度。【原文：Top South African bankers are the most optimistic they’ve been about the nation’s economic prospects in decades following a spate of good news.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚经济超出预期，实现 2022 年以来最快增长
item.description: 哥伦比亚的经济超过了所有预测，取得了自 19 世纪科维德大流行病以来最快的增长速度，这增加了中央银行可能需要开始提高利率的可能性。【原文：Colombia’s economy beat all forecasts with the fastest growth since the aftermath of the Covid-19 pandemic, boosting the chances that the central bank may need to start raising interest rates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Rostec 公司称战争产出飙升弥补了出口损失
item.description: 俄罗斯国防企业集团俄罗斯国家技术公司（Rostec State Corp.【原文：Russian defense conglomerate Rostec State Corp.’s soaring production for the military is helping compensate for a plunge in exports amid international sanctions, its chief executive officer said Tuesday.】

item.title: 谷歌推出新的双子座人工智能模型，提供交互式答案
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司首次发布了其人工智能模型 "双子座"（Gemini）的升级版，公司高管称，该模型在推理和编码能力方面实现了 "巨大飞跃"。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google debuted an updated version of its artificial intelligence model, Gemini, that executives said represents a “massive jump” in reasoning and coding ability.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Lovable 年化销售额达 2 亿美元，将进行新一轮融资
item.description: 瑞典人工智能编码初创公司 Lovable 表示，该公司的年经常性收入已达到 2 亿美元，这是公司快速增长的一个标志，使该公司能够在上一轮融资后不到五个月的时间里进行融资。【原文：Lovable, a Swedish artificial intelligence coding startup, said it has reached $200 million in annual recurring revenue, a sign of rapid growth that’s allowing the company to raise funds less than five months after its last round.】
